Voucher No : {{ doc.name }} Date : {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.transaction_date) }}
Pack Ord No : {{ doc.po_no or "-" }}
Party : {{ doc.customer_name }}
{% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
SI# Item Name Qty Free Rate Disc Net Amount
{{ loop.index }} {{ item.item_name }} {{ item.qty }} {{ item.free_qty or 0 }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.rate, currency=doc.currency) }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.discount_amount or 0, currency=doc.currency) }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.amount, currency=doc.currency) }}
Net Total {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.net_total, currency=doc.currency) }}
Amount in words:
{{ doc.in_words }}
For {{ doc.company }}

Authorized Signatory

MM 6/173 F, G, SANDY TOWER,CHERANI,
MANJERI, MALAPPURAM, KERALA - 676123
